participant_1.background:
I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars.
i want to get married again.
my mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
my name is arnold.

participant_2.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing today?
Doing well, thank you for asking. How are you today?
Pretty good. I am Arnold, what is your name?
My name is Sarah. It is nice to meet you, Arnold.
It is nice to meet you too, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, ride my motorcycle, and dance.
Those are all great hobbies. I like to cook too. I have always wanted to learn how to ride a motorcycle, but I am afraid I would crash.
You should definitely give it a try. It is a lot of fun and it is a great way to get around.
Maybe I will. What is your favorite food to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different things, but my favorite is probably pasta with pesto sauce.
That sounds delicious. I love pesto sauce.
It is really good. I like to add a lot of fresh basil to it.
I bet that makes it taste great.
It does. I also like to add some pine nuts and parmesan cheese.
That sounds like a perfect dish. I am going to have to try making it sometime.
You should. I am sure you would love it.
Thanks for the suggestion. I am sure I will.
You are welcome. I am glad I could help.
